title: How to Read Hieroglyphics & Ancient Egyptian Art: Exercises 1
description: Unlock the mysteries of ancient Egypt, decipher magic spells, the cartouche names, or the titles of the pharaohs.
quote1: I have a number of books on reading hieroglyphics but really love this one - it's Ideal if you want to learn how to read hieroglyphs, very clear and concise.

title: How to Read Hieroglyphics & Ancient Egyptian Art: Exercises 2
description: Unlock the mysteries of ancient Egypt, decipher magic spells, the cartouche names, or the titles of the pharaohs.
quote1: This book is a great follow-up to the first book in the series. It provides more exercises and deeper insights into reading hieroglyphs.

title: Hieroglyphic Sign List & Vocabulary: Extended Edition
description: An essential Hieroglyphic Sign List and Vocabulary handbook for learning how to read Hieroglyphics and Ancient Egyptian Art.
quote1: A comprehensive resource for anyone serious about learning hieroglyphics. The sign list is extensive and well-organised.
